# Richard Djarbeng

> Richard Djarbeng's website with technical and personal posts. Tech blogs + real-life adventures in East Africa, USA and Europe.

## Main Sections

- [Home](https://rdjarbeng.com/) - Technical articles, blog posts about web development, AI, and IoT devices.
- [About Me](https://rdjarbeng.com/about/) - Information about Richard Djarbeng, learning journey and reflections.
- [Contact](https://rdjarbeng.com/contact/) - How to get in touch.

## Content Collections

- [Personal Blog](https://rdjarbeng.com/personal/) - Reflections and stories from real-life adventures.
- [Projects](https://rdjarbeng.com/projects/) - Selected software and engineering projects.
- [Gallery](https://rdjarbeng.com/gallery/) - A collection of images, videos and other media.

## Navigation and Discovery

- [Search](https://rdjarbeng.com/search/) - Search through all posts and articles.
- [Tags](https://rdjarbeng.com/tags/) - Browse content by specific tags.
